mapper.select: SELECT ba.id, ba.content, ba.create_time, u.name, u.small_head_photo smallHeadPhoto, ba.user_id, us.name nickName, us.small_head_photo replySmallHeadPhoto, IF(ba.user_id = #{userId}, 1, 0) isMySelf, if(ba.reply_comment_id!="",(select content from oe_bxs_appraise where id=ba.reply_comment_id),"") replyContent, if(ba.reply_comment_id!="",(select create_time from oe_bxs_appraise where id=ba.reply_comment_id),"") replyCreateTime FROM oe_bxs_appraise ba LEFT JOIN oe_user us ON ba.target_user_id = us.id, oe_user u WHERE ba.user_id = u.id AND ba.is_delete = 0 AND ba.article_id = #{id} ORDER BY ba.create_time DESC
